attributes.action: Need get cap on the rising fuel price. Set the price around 1.80£.
attributes.additional_details: Set a cap price for a fuel in this case government not loose out on tax or Vat. Can be stop the rasing price and help for a nation.
attributes.background: Set a price cap for a rising fuel. Diesel and Petrol 1.80£/liter

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Government aren't responsible for setting fuel prices, but you might like to sign this petition calling for tax to be suspended

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610567
